Game.Name: 2 in 1 Game Pack - Shrek 2 & Shark Tale (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Sv+En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: 2 In 1 Game Pack: Shrek 2 / Shark Tale is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vicarious Visions and published by Activision,which was released in 2005.Cheat: Shrek 2 UnlockablesDo what they say and you will get the reward.Cheat: In most levels you can find the Leprechaun to play Mini-Games. However, if you beat the game 100%, you can unlock all the Mini-Games and play them as often as you want.
